SceneText.FriendlyName: Alvan Mountains - in front of shack

Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: アルヴァン山脈
Entry.EnglishText: Alvan Mountains

Entry.JapaneseText: アルヴァン山脈
Entry.EnglishText: Alvan Mountains
Entry.Notes: This place's name in the menu

Entry.JapaneseText: ふぅーやっと峠か。 さすがに疲れたネ…… 少し休憩しようよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Phew, we've made it to the top. All this climbing sure takes it out of you... Let's take a break.

Entry.JapaneseText: ダメだ。オレたちが こうしている間にクレアは……
Entry.EnglishText: No. As we speak, Claire is...

Entry.JapaneseText: 無理をするなと言っただろう？ 強行軍のうえ、この山越えで フォルスを使ったおまえは かなり消耗しているはずだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Didn't I say not to push yourself? Not only has the climb itself been strenuous, you must be exhausted after using your Force so much.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……大丈夫だ。 これくらい大した事じゃない。 クレアに比べれば……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm fine. This is nothing compared to what Claire's going through.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……あいつは一年も氷の中にいて、 やっと自由になれたのに……
Entry.EnglishText: After being trapped in ice for a whole year, she barely had the chance to enjoy her freedom...

Entry.JapaneseText: それはナニ？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, what's that?

Entry.JapaneseText: これは……
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, this?

Entry.JapaneseText: そっか……そのキレイな石は、 クレアさんからのプレゼント だったんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Ah, so that pretty stone you carry with you was a gift from Claire.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……クレア……
Entry.EnglishText: Claire...

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえの気持ちはわかる。 だが、ここで体力を使い果たして、 どうやって彼女を救う？
Entry.EnglishText: I understand how you feel, <Veigue>. But how do you intend to save her if you use up all of your energy here?

Entry.JapaneseText: サレたちに追いつけば、 ただで彼女を返してもらえると 思うのか？
Entry.EnglishText: When we catch up to Saleh, do you expect him to just let her go?

Entry.JapaneseText: 彼女に追いつく事だけが 目的じゃない。 それを忘れるな。
Entry.EnglishText: Catching up with Claire isn't the only thing that we'll have to do. Don't forget that.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>、休んで体力が回復したら その分、スピードアップしよう!! ボク、走っちゃうヨ!! ……なんてネ♪
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>, if we rest up now, we'll be able to speed up afterward! I'll be zipping down the mountain! ...Just kidding♪

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>……わかった。
Entry.EnglishText: Got it, <Mao>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
